entities.name: Smart Controls
entities.description: This tutorial guides you through the world of Smart Controls in SAPUI5.

samples.name: Smart Controls
samples.description: Smart Controls Example

samples.description: Filter Bar visualizing some filters. Not a full application!

samples.name: Smart Filter Bar
samples.description: SmartFilterBar creates a FilterBar for an OData entity based on the OData metadata.

samples.description: SmartFilterBar inside of the sap.f.DynamicPage.

samples.name: SmartFilterBar with useDateRangeType setting set to true
samples.description: Enable all Edm.DateTime fields with filter-restriction interval to use DateRangeType

samples.description: Add a DateRangeType controlConfiguration for filter fields with Edm.DateTime type.

samples.name: SmartFilterBar with controlConfiguration conditionType customDateRangeType
samples.description: Add a custom DateRangeType controlConfiguration for filter fields with Edm.DateTime type.

samples.name: Smart Filter Bar with fiscal annotations
samples.description: A FilterBar with fiscal date filters.

samples.name: Smart Table
samples.description: SmartTable control creates a table for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart (Grid) Table with Criticality
samples.description: SmartTable control of type Grid Table with ObjectStatus control for representing Criticality annotation

samples.name: Smart (Responsive) Table with Criticality
samples.description: SmartTable control of type Responsive Table with ObjectStatus control for representing Criticality annotation

samples.name: Smart List
samples.description: SmartList control creates a sap.m.List for an OData entity set based on the template provided in the view.

samples.name: Smart List with sap.m.Tree
samples.description: SmartList control configured to show a sap.m.Tree based on the configuration and template provided in the view.

samples.name: Smart Chart
samples.description: SmartChart control creates a chart for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Chart with chart qualifier
samples.description: SmartChart control selects the chart from the OData metadata with a CustomData chart qualifier.

samples.name: Smart Chart using a non-aggregating service
samples.description: SmartChart control bound to an entityset that is not marked as aggregating. Features like drill-down aren't available.

samples.name: Smart Chart with presentation variant
samples.description: SmartChart control presents data based on PresentationVariant annotation.

samples.name: Smart Chart with presentation variant qualifier
samples.description: SmartChart control selects the PresentationVariant for presenting the chart with a CustomData presentation variant qualifier.

samples.name: Smart Chart with semantic patterns
samples.description: SmartChart control uses chart measure semantics based on UI.DataPoint annotation.

samples.name: Smart Chart with semantic coloring on measure semantic
samples.description: SmartChart control uses chart measure semantic coloring based on UI.DataPoint annotation.

samples.name: Smart Chart with semantic coloring on dimension semantic
samples.description: SmartChart control uses chart measure semantic coloring based on UI.ValueCriticality annotation.

samples.name: Smart Chart with lightweight settings
samples.description: SmartChart control uses specific settings, such as a switch for the visibility of the toolbar, to show a simplified control.

samples.name: Smart  Micro Chart
samples.description: The control creates a chart for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata and annotations. The sample shows the chart types which are currently supported, BulletMicroChart, AreaMicroChart or RadialMicroChart.

samples.name: DataPoint Visualization
samples.description: This sample shows the usage of a BulletMicroChart control with a DataPoint annotation.

samples.name: Smart Area Micro Chart
samples.description: SmartAreaMicroChart control creates a chart for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Line Micro Chart
samples.description: Shows a smart line micro chart for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Column Micro Chart
samples.description: Shows a smart column micro chart for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Stacked Bar Micro Chart
samples.description: SmartStackedBarMicroChart control creates a chart for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Comparison Micro Chart
samples.description: SmartComparisonMicroChart control creates a chart for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Bullet Micro Chart in Delta Mode
samples.description: This sample shows a SmartBulletMicroChart control used in delta mode.

samples.name: Criticality directly set
samples.description: This sample shows how to directly set value criticalities via OData vocabulary annotations only. In addition, the unitOfMeasure association is used as well as the chartQualifier.

samples.name: Criticality Calculation: Target Direction
samples.description: This sample shows the "CriticalityCalculation" annotation of the OData vocabulary with ImprovementDirection "Target".

samples.name: Criticality Calculation: Minimize Direction
samples.description: This sample shows "CriticalityCalculation" annotation of the OData vocabulary with ImprovementDirection "Minimize".

samples.name: Criticality Calculation: Maximize Direction
samples.description: This sample shows the "CriticalityCalculation" annotation of the OData vocabulary with ImprovementDirection "Maximize".

samples.name: Smart Delta Micro Chart
samples.description: Shows a smart delta micro chart for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Criticality directly set
samples.description: This sample shows how to directly set value criticalities via OData vocabulary annotations only. In addition, the unitOfMeasure association is used as well as the chartQualifier.

samples.name: Criticality Calculation: Minimize Direction
samples.description: This sample shows "CriticalityCalculation" annotation of the OData vocabulary with ImprovementDirection "Minimize".

samples.name: Criticality Calculation: Maximize Direction
samples.description: This sample shows the "CriticalityCalculation" annotation of the OData vocabulary with ImprovementDirection "Maximize".

samples.name: Criticality directly set
samples.description: This sample shows how to directly set value criticalities via OData vocabulary annotations only. In addition, the unitOfMeasure association is used as well as the chartQualifier.

samples.name: Criticality Calculation: Minimize Direction
samples.description: This sample shows "CriticalityCalculation" annotation of the OData vocabulary with ImprovementDirection "Minimize".

samples.name: Criticality Calculation: Maximize Direction
samples.description: This sample shows the "CriticalityCalculation" annotation of the OData vocabulary with ImprovementDirection "Maximize".

samples.name: Smart Harvey Ball Micro Chart
samples.description: Shows a smart Harvey Ball micro chart for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Multi Edit with All Supported Datatypes
samples.description: Shows a smart table that includes attributes of all datatypes supported by the smart multi edit dialog.

samples.name: Smart Multi Edit
samples.description: Shows a smart table with a smart multi edit dialog.

samples.name: Smart Table with responsive table
samples.description: SmartTable control creates a responsive table for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Table with responsive table having row highlight
samples.description: SmartTable control creates a responsive table with row highlight, for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Table with responsive table having custom column
samples.description: SmartTable control creates a responsive table for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata as well as having custom column.

samples.name: Smart Table with responsive table having sticky toolbar and column headers
samples.description: SmartTable control creates a responsive table with sticky toolbar and column headers.

samples.name: Smart Table with custom buttons for personalization features (sort, filter..)
samples.description: SmartTable control with custom toolbar buttons to open individual panels of personalization directly.

samples.name: Smart Table with full screen button
samples.description: SmartTable control creates a table for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata and also has a full screen button.

samples.name: Smart Table with Smart Bullet Micro Chart
samples.description: SmartTable control creates a responsive table containing SmartBulletMicroChart control for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Table with Tree Table
samples.description: SmartTable control creates a Tree Table for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata. Note: This example is based on mock data, so defining the number of levels in the beforeRebindTable event should be avoided for performance reasons.

samples.name: Smart Table with responsive table using the DataStateIndicator plugin
samples.description: This example demonstrates how the DataStateIndicator plugin can be used as dependents aggregation to show binding-related messages of the inner table.

samples.name: Smart Form using ResponsiveGridLayout
samples.description: SmartForm control creates a form for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Form using ColumnLayout
samples.description: SmartForm control creates a form for an OData entity set based on the OData metadata.

samples.name: Smart Field
samples.description: Smart Field examples

samples.name: Smart Field - TextInEditModeSource (Experimental)
samples.description: Smart field with the TextInEditModeSource property defined.

samples.name: Smart Fields with ValueHelp
samples.description: Smart Field with ValueHelp examples

samples.name: Smart Field as Link
samples.description: Smart Field as Link examples

samples.name: Smart Multi Input with Data Binding
samples.description: A Smart Multi Input control bound to an OData navigation property. This sample shows how to create and remove entities in the navigation property entity set.

samples.name: Smart Multi Input Without Data Binding
samples.description: A Smart Multi Input control mapped to a navigation property without binding. In this sample, the Smart Multi Input control does not create or remove entities but can be used as a filter.

samples.name: Smart Multi Input Inside a Smart Form
samples.description: A Smart Multi Input control embedded in a smart form with custom data.

samples.name: ValueHelpDialog basic sample
samples.description: A ValueHelpDialog with a basic configuration. This sample shows a supportMultiselect mode

samples.name: ValueHelpDialog single select sample
samples.description: A ValueHelpDialog with supportMultiselect set to false. This sample shows a single selection in the table

samples.name: ValueHelpDialog with a conditions tab only
samples.description: A ValueHelpDialog with supportRanges and supportRangesOnly set to true. This sample shows conditional panel configuration

samples.name: ValueHelpDialog with a single condition tab
samples.description: A ValueHelpDialog with supportRanges and supportRangesOnly set to true and maxIncludeRanges set to 1. This sample shows conditional panel configuration which supports only 1 include

samples.name: ValueHelpDialog with a filterbar
samples.description: A ValueHelpDialog filterbar. This sample shows a ValueHelpDialog with a filterbar

samples.name: ValueHelpDialog with a input suggestions
samples.description: A ValueHelpDialog with input suggestions. This sample shows a ValueHelpDialog with a suggestions for the input

samples.name: SmartField with custom data type
samples.description: SmartField with custom validation
